tool_description: More than 60,000 radio stations from different countries and various genres

api_list.name: Get Cities
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of cities where radio stations are located.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Filter cities by country ID. Leave empty to include all.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Filter cities by keyword. Leave empty to include all.

api_list.name: Get Countries
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of countries with available radio stations.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Filter countries by keyword. Leave empty to include all.

api_list.name: Get Channels
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of radio channels.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Filter channels by keyword. Leave empty to include all.

optional_parameters.name: genre_id
optional_parameters.description: Filter channels by genre ID. Leave empty to include all.

optional_parameters.name: city_id
optional_parameters.description: Filter channels by city ID. Leave empty to include all.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Filter channels by country ID. Leave empty to include all.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specify the page number for pagination.

api_list.name: Get Genres
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of music genres available in the radio stations.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Filter genres by keyword. Leave empty to include all.
